page.title: 04Hadstock Football Club
page.content: Hadstock football club was formed in about 1950 but about 25 years later nobody bothered to turn up so the club was disbanded. After a few years a handful of people started the club up again, but unfortunately they haven't got a single trophy to their name. Their league is called the Rayments North West Essex league. The team practise on Sunday mornings before their matches; they also practise on Wednesday evenings if they have a match on that week. The team have had a highest score of 5-1, but they have been beaten 8-2. A new pavilion to be built near the ground. All the younger players have to go to Ashdon to play, as there isn't a junior club in Hadstock.
